short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grow a little buddy by feeding him carrots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (This is a game of sorts) Hatch your very own lil bud. They love carrots, so try to feed him some. Your bud grows up in a pop-up box, install now to grow your own lil bud.
